settings.section_html:
Teangle Teacher Giveaway

To honor teachers and their love for education, we’re giving away our best selling matcha bundle - Teangle Starter Pack, to an entire school faculty in Quebec, Canada.

The more entries your school gets, the more chances you have of winning. It’s a win-win!

GET STARTED

THANK YOU TO OUR AMAZING HEALTHCARE FAMILY !

We can’t thank YOU enough for working night and day to keep us all safe. As a token of our appreciation for everything YOU do, we’re giving away 1,145 Teangle Starter Packs to help fuel healthcare workers across Quebec.

ENTER TO GET YOUR FREE MATCHA

Discover Teangle!
A Teachers Best Friend

Teangle is a delicious and healthy lifestyle drink that can help you feel and perform your best.

Increases energy
Reduces stress
Improves productivity
Enhances mood

Here’s What You and Your School Can Win!

Teangle Starter Pack
Our best selling bundle which retails at 78$

Ginger & Lemongrasss Matcha

Premium matcha powder packed with ginger, lemongrass and just a little sprinkling of stevia for a delicious natural flavour

Teangle spoon

Holds exactly the right amount of powder to make sure you get the perfect Matcha E-V-E-R-Y-T-I-M-E!

Chai Matcha

Premium matcha powder powered up with cinnamon and cardamom and ginger and fennel and - hang on, we need to take a breath - nutmeg and just a little sprinkling of stevia

Teangle spoon

Holds exactly the right amount of powder to make sure you get the perfect Matcha E-V-E-R-Y-T-I-M-E!

Teangle Bottle

Put your Matcha in with hot (never boiling) or cold water, shake and you're ready to go go go!

Here’s What You and Your School Can Win!

Teangle spoon

Holds exactly the right amount of powder to make sure you get the perfect Matcha E-V-E-R-Y-T-I-M-E!

Teangle Bottle

Put your Matcha in with hot (never boiling) or cold water, shake and you're ready to go go go!

Not a Teacher?

No problem. Join in on the fun by spreading the word on your social media.

TAG A TEACHER

#PageContainer { overflow: hidden !important; }
.site-footer { display: none !important; }

#prr_id1602697151098 {
    padding: 6% 0 10%;
    background: transparent url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/1835/6147/files/giveaway-1j.jpg) left bottom no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
}
.carouselbb  .slick-next {
    right: 10px!important;
    top: 40% !important;
}
.carouselbb  .slick-prev {
    left: 10px!important;
    z-index: 1;
    top: 40% !important;
}
.carouselbb  .slick-prev:before, .carouselbb   .slick-next:before {
    font-size: 20px!important;
    opacity: 1!important;
    color: #1e4845!important;
}
.slick-dots {  bottom: -36px !important; margin: 0 !important; }
  #footer_cols { display: none !important; }
.giveaway-1 {
    max-width: 1120px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 5vw 0;
}
.giveaway-1 h2  { font: 600 1.9em/1.5 Varela, Muli, Arial; margin-bottom: 2rem; }
.giveaway-1 p  , .giveaway-3 p , .giveaway-4 p { font-size: 16px;  bottom: 2rem; }
.giveaway-1 a , .joinbtn {
    background: #D87739;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    color: #fff;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: 600;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
}
.giveaway-1 a:hover , .joinbtn:hover {
    background: #fff;
    color: #27cf7e;
}
.rowga { display: grid; grid-auto-flow: column; gap: 0%; }  
  
.giveaway-2, .giveaway-3, .giveaway-4, .giveaway-5 { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }

.giveaway-2 h3 { font: 600 26px/1.2 Varela, Muli, Arial; margin-bottom: 2rem; }
.giveaway-2 h5  { margin-bottom: 20px; }
.colga1 { width: 40vw; max-width: 500px; background: transparent url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0263/3606/7666/files/All-Day-Energy-Packed-with-Delicious-Natural-Flavord.jpg?v=1648747687) center center no-repeat; background-size: cover; }
.colga2 { padding: 10% 12%; max-width: 600px; background: #F7EEE3; }
 .giveaway-2 p {  margin-bottom: 30px; }  
.colga2 img { max-width: 65px; }
.footer_nsl_wrap , .announcement-bar { display: none; } 
  
.giveaway-3 h4, .giveaway-4 h4 { font: 600 22px/1.5 Varela, Muli, Arial; margin-bottom: 1rem; text-transform: none; letter-spacing: 0px; }
.col_ourg_text h4 { font: 600 20px/1.5 Varela, Muli, Arial; margin-bottom: 10px; text-transform: none; letter-spacing: 0px; }
.giveaway-3 h4 span , .giveaway-4 h4  span { font-weight: 400; font-size: 18px; font-style: italic; }
.giveaway-3 a , .giveaway-4 a  {
    background: #D87739;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    color: #fff;
border-radius: 30px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-weight: 600;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
}
 .giveaway-5 h3 { font: 600 26px/1.2 Varela, Muli, Arial; margin-bottom: 8px; }
 .col_ourg_text p { font-size: 13px; }
.col_ourg {
    
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0 1%;
    float: left;
}
.col_ourg1 , .col_ourg3 {  width: 30%; } 
.col_ourg2 { width: 40%; } 
.col_ourg_text { padding-top: 15px; position: relative;     padding-left: 15px; }  
#footer_cols { margin-top: 0 !important;}
#prr_id1602697195783 , #prr_id1602697182382 { background: #f5f5f5; }
  
.arrows-hc { position: absolute;  width: 50px; height: 50px;  }  
.arrhc1 { top: 70px; right: -40px; transform: rotate(125deg); }
.arrhc2  { top: 80px; left: -20px; -webkit-transform: scaleX(-1) rotate(-265deg); transform: scaleX(-1) rotate(-265deg); }
.arrhc3  { top: 70px; right: -40px; transform: scaleX(-1) rotate(-425deg); }
.arrhc4  { top: 80px; left: -20px; -webkit-transform: scaleX(1) rotate(-55deg); transform: scaleX(1) rotate(-55deg); } 
  #prr_id1602697683805 { background-color: #27cf7e; }  
  
@media only screen and (max-width: 769px) {
#prr_id1602697151098 { background: #ececec; text-align: center; padding: 55px 0px 40;}
.giveaway-1 { color: #fff; }
.giveaway-1 h2 , .giveaway-2 h3  { font: 600 22px/1.2 Varela, Muli, Arial; }
.giveaway-1 p  , .giveaway-3 p , .giveaway-4 p { font-size: 15px; }
.rowga , .colga1, .colga2 { width: 100%; display: block; }
.colga2 { padding: 10% 4%; background: #F7EEE3; }
 .colga1 { min-height: 65vw; background: transparent url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0263/3606/7666/files/All-Day-Energy-Packed-with-Delicious-Natural-Flavor_356x.jpg?v=1648744950) center center no-repeat; background-size: cover; }
 .col_ourg { width: 100% !important; }
.index-section {
    margin: 0px 0 !important;
    padding: 52px 0 !important;
}
.giveaway-1 a, .joinbtn {
    display: block;
    margin: 0 0 10px;
    text-align: center;
}
.giveaway-3 a, .giveaway-4 a { display: block;    text-align: center; }
.giveaway-3 h4, .giveaway-4 h4 { font: 600 20px/1.5 Varela, Muli, Arial;}
  #prr_id1602697162298 { display: block; } 
  .slick-slide img {
    margin: 0 auto;
}
